Individual

public Individual(int size,
                  malthus.util.Random r)
Real "default" constructor to only be used for initializing the members of the first generation.

Parameters:
size - length of the solution string.
r - Random object used by the population.

Individual

public Individual(Individual p1,
                  Individual p2,
                  malthus.util.Random random)
Standard constructor. Takes two parent individuals and does crossover at a random bit (rounded down) along the genotype, calculates the fitness based on the population objective function and then calculates the child's individual mutation rate as the average of its parents.

Parameters:
p1 - parent providing the leading genotype of the child.
p2 - parent providing the tail genotype of the child.
random - Random object used by the population.
See Also:
crossover(Individual, Random), #calcFitness(), mutate()

Takes the genotype of the caller and the argument parent Individual and fills in a new BitSet up to a point (determined by the population's Random object) from the caller and the rest from the argument.

random -
